hdb.table

Class Table<PrimaryKey extends java.lang.Comparable<? super PrimaryKey>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • hdb.table.Table<PrimaryKey>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Iterable<PrimaryKey>

    public class Table<PrimaryKey extends java.lang.Comparable<? super PrimaryKey>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Iterable<PrimaryKey>
    This Table Class, along with Partition are the Backbone of HarambeDB, it creates a directory inside the project where the table and partition files are stored, with extensions .hbtb and .hbpt respectibly, each partition has an auto-increment ID to identify the partition uniquely. An AVL tree is used to index the database, the key of the tree node is the minimum value in that particular partition and the value is the ID of the partition. The minimum value is used to determine in which partition a certain row should be stored or retrieved from. The THRESHOLD constant is the maximum number of elements a partition can store before another partition is automatically created, feel free to modify this value as you need.

    This class is a member of the HarambeDB database framework.

    See Also:
    Partition, HarambePartition, ColumnList, Column, Row, Serialized Form

        Creates a new table within the specified database directory
        Parameters:
        dbPath - The path to the database directory this table belongs to
        tableName - The name of the tablle
        primaryKeyType - The Class of the primary key
        primaryKeyName - The name of the primary key column
        Throws:
        HarambException - If there is an error creating the table file or if a database with the same name already exists

      • getRowWithRelation

        public <OtherPrimaryKey extends java.lang.Comparable<? super OtherPrimaryKey>> ArrayLinearList<Row> getRowWithRelation(PrimaryKey key,
                                                                                                                       Database db)
                                                                                                                throws HarambException
        Retrieves the row of the specified key and its chain of relations (i.e.: if the related table of one row has a column with another relation then the row of that relation is retrieved as well)
        Type Parameters:
        OtherPrimaryKey - The data type of the primary key of the other table
        Parameters:
        key - The value of the primary key of the row
        Class - The class of the other primary key
        db - The database the related tables are located
        Returns:
        A list of rows containing the row of this table at position 0 and related rows from 1 up to n, where n is the size of the list.
        Throws:
        HarambException - If there is an error reading table or partition files

      • getRowWithRelations

        public <OtherPrimaryKey extends java.lang.Comparable<? super OtherPrimaryKey>> List<Row> getRowWithRelations(PrimaryKey key,
                                                                                                             Database db)
                                                                                                      throws HarambException
        Retrieves the row of the specified key and its chain of relations (i.e.: if the related table of one row has a column with another relation then the row of that relation is retrieved as well)
        Type Parameters:
        OtherPrimaryKey - The data type of the primary key of the other table
        Parameters:
        key - The value of the primary key of the row
        db - The database the related tables are located
        Returns:
        A list of size n where list[0] is the row of this column and list[1:n] is the chain of relations
        Throws:
        HarambException - If there is an error reading table or partition files
